OOC- Remember, it was me that mentioned something about a bit of overkill.


Blast after blast of energy struck the mutant hawk. Her blood already
stained the floor of the Black Fortress. Blacknightmare was obviously a bot
who didn't take chances. Either that or the Predacon just loved to shoot her
stungun. Silver Scout fainted out of  consciousness, her vitals were slowing
as she lay in a lump on the floor. Shr had challenged her foe and lost. If
she didn't recieve help she'd soon die.

Blaze and Bullet stood over the still bot stareing at the bot. Bullet kicked
it viciously to make sure it wasn't acting. "We got it boss." he said
turning to Blacknightmare.

Blaze licked her lips at the sight of the downed hawk, "Can we eat it?" she
asked hopeing for a good organic meal. The energeon rations that she'd been
eating were adaquate for survival but tasted like battery acid compared to a
good organic meal. She transformed to tiger and started sniffing Silver
Scout. "She's still alive." she stated in disapointment. "Can I kill it?"
she asked, as she took a lick of  the mutants energeon from the floor.


----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 22, 2001 4:23 PM
Subject: Re: Happanings at BlackFortress


> Blaacknightmare:
>
> Blacknightmare ran towars Silverscout, aimed her stungun and said "We
> capture you!!!!"
>
> She fired 25 times against Silverscout, she knew that it will be
> enough to put her in stasis lock.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:> Silver
> Scout was ready this time. she rolled to her feat jumping into the
> > air causeing two shots to pass under her. the next shot pushed her
> back to
> > the floor sending her sliding into the wall. the fourth shot went
> passed her
> > and headed toward Bullet. The mutant saw a flaw to her tactics, she
> had just
> > pinned herself between Kit Kat and the other Predacons.(remember
> Robo
> > whatever shots miss Silver Scout are headed towards Kit Kat2)
> >
> > Bullet crossed his arms deflecting the shot. his arm singed from
> the impact.
> > "Be more carefull with that thing would you?" he shouted toward Kit
> Kat.
> > There were to many bots in the halls to be endangered by friendly
> fire.
> >
> > Blaze aimed her disruptor, firing at the intruder three times.
> >
> > Silver Scout moved quickly as she could trying to avoid any further
> damage.
> > To many shots flew through the hallway to tell who was fireing or
> when.
> > Blacknightmares stun blasts weakened her, Blazes disruptor
> scrambled her
> > circuitry, and Enders sidearms pierced her organics causing more of
> the
> > strange red energeon to flow from her form. She transformed to her
> hawk form
> > and attempted to escape but no sooner had she left the ground that
> she lost
> > her strength and collapsed back to the floor of the Black Fortress.
